remarks: Two expressions for a 1-dimensional subspace of vector space H (when ` F ` is a nonzero vector i.e. non-identity translation).  (Contributed by NM, 24-Feb-2014.)
statement:
dib1dim2.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
dib1dim2.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dib1dim2.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
dib1dim2.r $e |- R = ( ( trL ` K ) ` W ) $.
dib1dim2.o $e |- O = ( h e. T |-> ( _I |` B ) ) $.
dib1dim2.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dib1dim2.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoB ` K ) ` W ) $.
dib1dim2.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` U ) $.
dib1dim2 $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ F e. T ) -> ( I ` ( R ` F ) ) = ( N ` { <. F , O >. } ) ) $.
$d B h $.
$d K h $.
$d T h $.
$d W h $.
